name: Ignitho Technologies
description:
Ignitho is a Digital Technology Solutions company, recognized as a preferred partner for Digital Applications & Innovation for enterprises using Frugal Innovation methodology – “the ability to do more with less” – developed in collaboration with a world-renowned thought leader from the University of Cambridge.
Ignitho specializes in:
Innovation Services – The ability to start small and deliver quick outcomes on limited budgets for the web, mobile and cloud
Innovation Labs – Ability to nurture business ideas on limited budgets into viable prototypes & MVPs for Enterprise Innovation Leads
Ignitho’s delivery strength lies in its robust pool of experienced, technically competent resources across Microsoft, Open Source, Mobile and Cloud technologies. Through a strongly established brand as a “desirable place to work”, Ignitho is able to attract and retain the best technical talent in the industry. Our customers have been delighted by our honest and transparent approach and our ethos of a “One Team” partnership with customers through a Distributed Agile project methodology. Ignitho has thereby built up an enviable track record of delivering top-tier service quality at a competitive price, with a niche player attitude to customer care.
Headquartered in the USA, Ignitho services its customers through its offices in New York, USA & London, UK, and its innovation labs & development centers in Richmond, USA, Brighton, UK and Kochi, India.
